comment._content: If the city of New York had not renamed, the affiche would say "Rotterdam, Amsterdam - New Amsterdam"

comment._content: Hi, we are a group dedicated to photos of typo/graphic posters and it would be a pleasure to have this photo in our showcase: typo/graphic posters

comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Cool old poster. Must be pretty early: NASM started up around 1872. Added to commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Holland_America_Line Thanks for posting these!
